name: R.care
headline: #1 Science backed eating disorder recovery program.
description: R.care is not just another diet program or calorie-counting app. It's a comprehensive, evidence-based solution designed to address the root causes of binge eating and provide lasting recovery. Say goodbye to waiting lists and hefty price tags, and take control of your relationship with food.

founders.name: Soy Hwang, Founder
founders.description: Soy leads the business & design of R.care. Prior to founding R.care, she worked at Boston Consulting Group digital ventures, building start-ups for fortune 500 companies.

founders.name: Sunny Kim, Founder
founders.description: Sunny leads Engineering & Innovation at R.care. Prior to founding R.care, she worked as a software engineer / tech lead on Machine Learning projects at YouTube and Google. She later co-founded Seknd, a beauty search and recommendation platform. She is passionate about using technology to bring innovation to underserved industries.

founders.name: Yon Soo Park, Founder
founders.description: Yon Soo leads Product at R.care. Prior to founding R.care, she worked as a software engineer in the Data Team of Amazon Web Services S3 and completed a PhD at Harvard. Her peer-reviewed research on rights has been covered by Washington Post, Vox, and Psychology Today.

# EmbraceScience,NOT Stigma.
**Don't let food struggles define you.****Get your personalized plan from****the #1 Neuroscience-backedrecovery program.**

![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=509,h=555,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/heroimg-mp83D8wE6MFG9yJG.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=212,h=216,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/heroimg-mp83D8wE6MFG9yJG.png)
[![playstore download](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=227,h=70,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/frame-163124-AVLz98XrOPuyQ09o.png)](https://www.recoverycare.app/<https:/recovery-care.app.link/web> "playstore download")[![playstore download](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=226,h=72,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/frame-163124-AVLz98XrOPuyQ09o.png)](https://www.recoverycare.app/<https:/recovery-care.app.link/web> "playstore download")
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=271,h=180,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-mart-production-7088526-YyvXxZaX5biGxM0e.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=189,h=131,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-mart-production-7088526-YyvXxZaX5biGxM0e.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=319,h=181,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-yaroslav-shuraev-8845106-AoPZ2q7E3ySWQ5ZM.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=192,h=139,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-yaroslav-shuraev-8845106-AoPZ2q7E3ySWQ5ZM.png)
### **Binge eating isn't just about food.**
### **It's about the emotions we're trying to feed.**
Did you know that restrictive diets and calorie counting exacerbate binge eating?Join R.care, the science-backed solution designed in collaboration with eating disorder experts from Harvard Medical School and more. Understand the real reasons behind binge eating and reclaim control over your relationship with food. Bring meaningful impact to your overall lifestyle.
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=194,h=54,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/hms_logo_final_rgb_0-m7Vp1BLvD7H760nN.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=144,h=30,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/hms_logo_final_rgb_0-m7Vp1BLvD7H760nN.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=271,h=181,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-alex-green-5699477-mv05B2a5oRTEl9nD.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=176,h=122,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/pexels-alex-green-5699477-mv05B2a5oRTEl9nD.png)
Binge eating looks different for everyone.
# Personalized Binge Eating Solutions
Start with a questionnaire to uncover your unique binge eating patterns. Based on the data from the quiz, R.Care creates **a personalized daily program just for you** , drawing from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT). 
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=487,h=433,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/f1-Y4LO5wPJ6GIxEpP7.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=328,h=278,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/f1-Y4LO5wPJ6GIxEpP7.png)
Calorie counting, more harm than good.
# Build Awareness _NOT_ Guilt
Snap a photo of your meal, get real-time coaching, log your meal, and stay mindful. **Our food logs are specially designed for eating disorder recovery.** Unlike other calorie-counting apps, which can fuel guilt and disrupt natural hunger cues, our coaching helps you build awareness and recognize patterns.
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=509,h=389,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.03.37-YNqPQWVXq4tn21Oj.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=305,h=237,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.03.37-YNqPQWVXq4tn21Oj.png)
**No More Pseudo-Science or Gimmicks.**
#  Evidence-Based Lessons & Techniques
We provide evidence-based knowledge and reflections for eating disorder recovery, breaking down complex concepts into interactive, bite-sized pieces—so you don’t have to dig through research articles yourself. **Engaging, easy-to-digest, research-backed content.**
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=382,h=392,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.32.04-YKbEGnMaM4HaW8Mo.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=269,h=278,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.32.04-YKbEGnMaM4HaW8Mo.png)
Never alone in your recovery journey.
# We help you stay motivated 
With our daily structured program, you can take just **5 minutes a day to stay on track and follow the plan.** Plus, our AI-based coaching and personalized recommendations adapt to your progress, offering a tailored program that evolves with you every step of the way.
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=399,h=415,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.43.30-A85EQ8KpabI5pQw1.png)
![](https://assets.zyrosite.com/cdn-cgi/image/format=auto,w=262,h=278,fit=crop/ALpB5v74ZDCZMxw1/screenshot-2025-02-04-at-15.43.30-A85EQ8KpabI5pQw1.png)
## **You're not alone.****We can overcome binge eating together.**

generated_description:
### R.care: Transforming Eating Disorder Recovery

**Mission**: R.care aims to provide the #1 science-backed eating disorder recovery program, moving beyond the stigma often associated with food struggles. 

**Overview**: Launched in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, R.care is not just another diet app. It’s a comprehensive, evidence-based solution aimed at tackling the root causes of binge eating without the burdens of waiting lists and high costs. It helps users regain control over their relationship with food.

**Location and Team**: Based in South Korea, R.care operates with a lean team of just three employees. Their group partner is Nan, bringing additional expertise and support.

**What They Offer**:
- **Personalized Solutions**: Users begin with a questionnaire to identify their unique binge eating patterns. R.care then crafts tailored daily programs utilizing techniques from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT).
- **Mindful Eating Practices**: Unlike traditional calorie-counting apps that can create guilt, R.care encourages awareness through meal logging, providing real-time coaching and feedback.
- **Research-Backed Content**: The platform breaks down complex scientific concepts into digestible lessons, helping users engage with the material without having to sift through overwhelming research papers.

**Engagement with Users**: The program emphasizes motivation with a structured, easy-to-follow daily plan that requires just five minutes a day, adapting as users progress.

**Why It Matters**: Binge eating isn't just about food; it often reflects deeper emotional needs. R.care seeks to address these underlying issues, offering a holistic approach to recovery.

**Get Involved**: Interested individuals can explore R.care’s offerings on their [website](https://www.recoverycare.app/) and download their app from major platforms to start their journey towards a healthier relationship with food.

In summary, R.care is transforming how people understand and recover from binge eating disorders, making recovery accessible, personalized, and grounded in solid scientific principles. You're not alone in this; R.care stands ready to accompany you on this journey.
